message.body: What do you think? It is more scrolling, but it does look less squished!
I agree. Does it look sexy enough?
I think we're really putting the sexiness on the home page, but this is still more modern than every other ########### site. Now, ####...
Love the matching of colors in logo and nav
Love the matching of colors in logo and nav
Me too! I'm concerned that they're all too close to #### site though
Yeah. Didn't think of that you are right. Maybe the other ones arent?
I'm afraid #### will say that this is supposed to be its own thing and it's too derivative
Where is the technohip separate look she requested
